solution_line_template: If the party was planned to start at 8:00 am, Paul was {paul_arrival_time_minutes_representation}-{party_start_time_minutes_representation} = <<{paul_arrival_time_minutes_representation}-{party_start_time_minutes_representation}={paul_late_minutes}>>{paul_late_minutes} minutes late.

If Paul was {paul_late_minutes} minutes late, Amoura was {paul_late_minutes}+{amoura_delay_from_paul} = <<{paul_late_minutes}+{amoura_delay_from_paul}={amoura_late_minutes}>>{amoura_late_minutes} minutes late.

If Ingrid was three times late than Amoura was, she was {ingrid_multiplier}*{amoura_late_minutes} = <<{ingrid_multiplier}*{amoura_late_minutes}={ingrid_late_minutes}>>{ingrid_late_minutes} minutes late
